comment: Absolutely love these spicy noodles! The flavor is rich and the spice is just right. Will order again.
Too spicy for me, but I can see how others might like it. Needed to add milk to calm it down.
Cheap, quick, and tasty. Perfect for a late-night study snack. Wish it had a bit more vegetables.
The texture of the noodles was too soft for my liking. Spice was okay but not impressed overall.
These are my go-to comfort noodles. I add a boiled egg and it tastes gourmet!
Pretty good! Packaging is nice and it cooks fast. Slightly too salty but manageable.
